2020-12-13.transcript:
DILBERT, I'M ASSIGNING YOU TO THE NETWORK REDESIGN PROJECT.

IT'S IN THE DEATH SPIRAL PHASE. 

EVERYONE IS TRYING TO ASSIGN BLAME TO SOMEONE THEY ALREADY HATE. 

THEY REQUESTED THAT I ADD YOU TO THE TEAM. 

TO SAVE THE PROJECT? 

UM... 

OKAY, SURE.

2020-12-14.transcript:

I HOPE THAT MEANS YOU WILL REPLACE THE BORING PARTS OF MY JOB WITH EXCITING NEW PROJECTS.

DOES IT MEAN DOING THE SAME WORK FOR HIGHER PAY?

2020-12-15.transcript:
WHEN I SAY WE NEED TO REIMAGINE YOUR JOB, IT MEANS WE NO LONGER NEED ANY ONE TO DO WHAT YOU HAVE BEEN DOING. 

DO YOU MIND IF I ASK WHEN YOU FIRST REALIZED THAT MY JOB WAS TOTALLY UNNECESSARY? 

IT WAS FOUR YEARS AGO, BUT YOU SEEMED HAPPY, AND WE HAD THE BUDGET TO PAY YOU, SO...

2020-12-16.transcript:
TODAY IS YOUR LAST DAY WITH THE COMPANY, TED. SO I NEED YOUR COMPANY LAPTOP BACK OR ELSE WHAT? 

YOULL FIRE ME TWICE? 

LET'S SAY YOU'RE NOT OFFICIALLY FIRED UNTIL YOU RETURN THE LAPTOP. 

AND IF I DON'T BRING IT BACK, WILL I NEVER BE FIRED? 

UM...

2020-12-17.transcript:

I LIKE REAL MONEY BETTER THAT JUST COST YOU TWO MO TIVOSITY BUCKS.

2020-12-18.transcript:
YOUR WORK HAS BEEN EXCEPTIONAL, BUT PEOPLE ARE COMPLAINING ABOUT YOUR ATTITUDE.

THEY THINK YOU DISLIKE THEM.

2020-12-19.transcript:

I HOPE YOU MEANT IT WHEN YOU SAID YOU WANT US TO BE HONEST WITH YOU. 

I DIDN'T EXPECT YOU TO ACT ON IT!

2020-12-20.transcript:
DID YOU SEE MY BRILLIANT PRODUCT IDEA I EMAILED TO YOU? 

YES, I ALREADY DEBUNKED IT IN MY MIND. 

PERHAPS YOU COULD SHARE YOUR REASONS IF IT'S SUCH A GREAT IDEA, WHY ISN'T SOMEONE ELSE DOING IT? 

AND IF SOMEONE IS ALREADY DOING IT, WE ARE FAR TOO LATE. 

IN ORDER FOR YOUR IDEA TO BE GOOD, I WOULD HAVE TO THINK YOU ARE SMARTER THAN EVERYONE IN THE INDUSTRY. 

AND SERIOUSLY, JUST LOOK AT YOU. 

ANYONE ELSE HAVE AN IDEA? 

NOPE. 

NOPE, NEVER. 

NOPE.

2020-12-21.transcript:

IT SAYS...

NOW SEE WHAT YOU DID TO WALLY.

2020-12-22.transcript:
YOU ARE ALL REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A CLASS IN ETHICS. 

WOULDN'T THAT MAKE US THE ONLY ETHICAL ORGANIZATION IN OUR INDUSTRY AND CREATE A COMPETITIVE DISADVANTAGE THAT LEADS TO OUR DEMISE? 

STOP YOUR WORRYING. 

THE CLASS IS REQUIRED, BUT I'M NOT EXPECTING ANY OF IT TO STICK.

2020-12-23.transcript:

2020-12-24.transcript:

HOW DO YOU DO THREE JOBS AT THE SAME TIME? 

IT COMES DOWN TO MANAGING OTHER PEOPLE'S - TATIONS.

2020-12-25.transcript:

2020-12-26.transcript:

ZOOM. 

HOW ABOUT NEXT TUESDAY AT 10 A.M. 

MY TIME, WHICH IS 1 P.M. YOUR TIME? 

 I'LL BE ON THE ROAD THEN, 50 YOUR 10 A.M. WILL BE MY NOON.

LET US NEVER SPEAK OF THIS AGAIN.

, WHAT HAVE YOU ACCOMPLISHED SINCE OUR PLANNING MEETING?
